comment.author: 31827154@N08
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called OLD PHOTOS, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 37819528@N06
comment._content: I think it's amazing  how  all the  men and women in these sets are so fit; nary an ounce of  excess fat.  Even though many are from the  1930s-1940s, post Depression,  they were all getting lots of exercise - no computers or  other  electronic devices  to distract them!

comment.author: 28846271@N06
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/strayshots] I think they are sharing a pair of bathing trunks...  ;)
